name: Don'tShootYourEyeOut
0:
”Alexa, open Don't Shoot Your Eye Out”
”Repeat the question”
”Help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: don't shoot your eye out
des:
You've been watching the classic holiday movie "A Christmas Story" every year for as long as you can remember, right? But is your knowledge of Ralphie and his family worthy of an A+? Let's find out! Your teacher, Miss Shields (as convincingly played by Alexa), will quiz you on over 160 trivia questions about the movie. The game incorporates all your favorite and the most memorable lines from the movie for added fun. Give it a shot... but don't shoot your eye out, kid!

The questions for "Don't Shoot Your Eye Out!" are also available in the Amazon bookstore: https://amzn.to/39GF5w6

For more information about this skill or to provide feedback: https://tinyurl.com/sherencoskills
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
